title: Akuma Tou no Prince: Mitsume ga Tooru
synopsis: The popular Manga "The Three-Eyed Boy Comes Here" was produced as the eighth in an animated series for a special 24-hour broadcast. This time, the movie was produced by Toei Animation Co., Ltd. instead of by Tezuka Productions Co., Ltd. Here, Tezuka Osamu was in charge of only the original story and a synopsis for animation.
staff: [['Tezuka, Osamu', ['Original Creator']], ['Miyazawa, Yasunori', ['In-Between Animation']], ['Hamasu, Hideki', ['Key Animation']], ['Kiyoyama, Shigetaka', ['Animation Director']]]
